Do you use the official install DVD or a modified one with this? Can someone give a link to the DVD to use?

i know little about the mac hack discs but i do know a fair amount on installation of them, insert the disc and try to boot off it. it will ask you to press any key to do so... do it. it will then boot to the installation.. see how it goes.. your machine may not run the installation in which case you would want to restart and boot from the cd, this time hit F8 to enter some code.. then you will want to try these..

-v then press enter

of not, try

-x and press enter..

if that doesnt work try them together and add vanilla at the end.. like this

-v -x vanilla    and then press enter

that last baby got mine going. note if you have an intel chipset and graphics onboard.. intel..you probaby wont need to do any of the codes.. just run the installation... hope i have saved you time looking at endless forums!! oh but drivers you on your own im afraid :(

hugs and kisses, ;) 

Humanzombie
